LanguageData.BioReactor.label: Bio Reactor
LanguageData.BioReactor.description: It is a bioreactor. It draws energy from living life.The amount of Nutrio to be injected into the living body is necessary.
LanguageData.BioReactor_Blueprint.label: Bio Reactor (blueprint)
LanguageData.BioReactor_Frame.label: Bio Reactor (building)
LanguageData.BioReactorCircleLarge.label: BioReactor (3X3)
LanguageData.BioReactorCircleLarge.description: It is a bioreactor. It draws energy from living life. Power output is proportional to body size of the creature contained. The amount of Nutrio to be injected into the living body is necessary.
LanguageData.BioReactorCircleLarge_Blueprint.label: BioReactor (3X3) (blueprint)
LanguageData.BioReactorCircleLarge_Frame.label: BioReactor (3X3) (building)
LanguageData.BioReactorCircleLarge_Frame.description: It is a bioreactor. It draws energy from living life. Power output is proportional to body size of the creature contained. The amount of Nutrio to be injected into the living body is necessary.
